title: What Should I Do if My Husband Is the Future Demon King? - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Demon Lord   Female Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Reincarnation
author: Wu Shi Yi   雾矢翊
description:
Wen Qiao has a delicate appearance with a strong personality, and would fight head-to-head if need. She is married to a disabled husband who can’t practice. Despite this, Wen Qiao do not dislike him, rather decides to live well with him for the rest of her life.

Later, she discovered that her husband was actually a genius proficient in all kinds of pill talisman and can accompany her to practice together. The couple could embark on a journey to ascend as gods. However, half way through the journey, she found out he is actually a reincarnation of the demon king and is only pretending to be a weak human. His real plan is to annihilate the world again.

Wen Qiao “………”>
